text: once upon a time somewhere in the North
Pole lived st. Nicholas aka
Santa Claus well he still does with mrs.
Claus the elves and the reindeers Santa
being Santa was busy arranging gifts
with the help of his elves but this time
Christmas was going to be different
Santa was about to get a very special
gift
himself on a cold night an adorable
little reindeer was born his name was
Rudolph but this little guy was not like
the other reindeers he was born with a
glowy red nose but Rudolph couldn't see
why he was special have you seen Rudolph
how strange is his nose so bright and
red like a clown and it is so big no
reindeer has such a big round shiny nose
look how funny it looks all the
reindeers made fun of Rudolph's nose not
realizing that it made Rudolph feel very
bad Rudolph was always sad that he was
different and felt left out why did I
have to have such a bright red nose
everyone just makes fun of me nobody
plays with me I'm good for nothing but
Rudolph would know very soon that this
too was a gift that night was in fact
Christmas Eve Santa Claus was getting
his reindeers together to fly around the
world
the elves were working hard some were
clearing the snow while some were
packing Santa's bag with gifts and
checking the list of naughty and nice
children Oh
all right everyone we don't have much
time left before we have to leave yes
yes they're all getting ready what about
you where's your suit have you combed
your beard and hair oh yes I am getting
ready to do just that don't worry it
won't take me very long my dear husband
you only have a few minutes left and
also every year we're having to make the
suit bigger and bigger it was then that
peppermint sticks
Santa's wisest elf came running to him
looking very worried and anxious Santa
mrs. Tuohy I have some bad news
it seems that there is a thick fog all
over the world
no hick even a reindeer eyes might
struggle to he threw it oh my this is
not good I have to deliver all these
presents tonight all the children of the
world are waiting for them what can we
do
ouch we have to think of something we
can't just sit here will anybody be able
to help can we attach lights in front
no the lights will fall off maybe we can
put the young ring gears in front their
eyes might be able to see you the fog
negative however young they are this fog
will be far too thick for any of them to
see through well then you come up with a
plan
what can you think of
I think I might have found the solution
hey buddy
Rudolph what plans do you have for
tonight
I hope you are free nothing special
Santa how do you know my name I know all
of my reindeer's names there is Dasher
and dancer and Prancer and vixen comet
Cupid dunder and blixem Rudolph couldn't
believe Santa knew all the names of his
reindeers again all right there is
Dasher dancer Prancer vixen comet Cupid
dunder and blixem
[Music]
what are you doing there is no time for
this what have you thought of relax
wifey Rudolph will help us tonight champ
won't you guide my sleigh tonight
Rudolph was surprised by santa's offer
he wasn't expecting it he looked at the
other reindeers shocked so were mrs.
Claus and pepper but Santa was sure of
his plan I don't think I can I have no
experience nonsense you are perfect
we need you tonight come on Rudolph lead
the way get him ready pepper pepper and
mrs. Claus dress Rudolph up like the
other reindeers and get him ready are
you sure about this
yes my dear I have a feeling he and his
bright red nose will guide me forever
now everyone set to go yeah wait wait
just a minute
safety first on Dasher on dancer on
Prancer and vixen on comet on Cupid on
Donner and Blitzen
and Rudolph to the top of the porch to
the top of the wall now dash away dash
away dash away all
Santa's sleigh moved slowly and then
took off into the night sky Rudolph was
nervous he was not sure of what he was
going to do the other reindeers were
glaring at him they all realized how
special Rudolph is and felt guilty about
making fun of him as the night darkened
the fog became thicker Rudolph and the
others were struggling to see Rudolph
turned to Santa Claus who was smiling at
him now bye boy no as the fog was at its
thickest Rudolph closed his eyes and his
nose lit up right friend brighter than
ever before it lit the way forward for
Santa and the other reindeers they
cheered for Rudolph with great joy with
the help of Rudolph's bright red nose
and his other reindeers of course Santa
was able to deliver every present to
every child on Christmas night I told
you didn't I you are my special boy you
will now always guide my sleigh with
your shiny glowy nose you are my
Christmas gift so as it came to pass
Rudolph would now forever lead Santa's
sleigh through the night through fog
through snow Rudolph would be right in
front to guide them isn't it amazing
Rudolph used to worry about his nose and
how special it turned out
at the end of the day it was what made
him unique so next time if you look up
in the sky and see Santa's sleigh fly
through the night see if you can find
Rudolph's bright shiny nose because he
will surely go down in history
